manageEachUserRewardList(List<User>) - Method in class com.openclassrooms.tourguide.service.RewardService
A method that allows the manageUserRewardList() method to be executed asynchronously on a list of users in order to improve the application's performance.
manageUserRewardList(User) - Method in interface com.openclassrooms.tourguide.service.IRewardService
 
manageUserRewardList(User) - Method in class com.openclassrooms.tourguide.service.RewardService
A method that adds reward to a User passed in parameter for each attraction he has visited around his current location and return the modified User for further performance enhancement.
